entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
